short_summary: Request for temporary help services in National capital region
duration_in_months: What the duration of the contract is (open-ended ? infinite ? precise number of months))
full_summary:
**Title:** Department of National Defense Requests Temporary Help Services under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870
==========================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-16-1630369
**Solicitation Number:** S4697447
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-15
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-11T11:00:00

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. This requirement is reserved for SA holders who have been qualified under Stream 13—Policy and advisory services, Category 13.5 Program administration.

The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* 4Plan Consulting Corp.
* ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC. (Joint Venture)
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. (Joint Venture)
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Akkodis Canada Inc.
* Deloitte Inc.
* Gartner Canada Co.
* Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. (Joint Venture)
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* NATTIQ INC.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* Solutions LDC Inc.

The temporary help services requirement includes:

* Program administration
* Policy and advisory services

The minimum security level required is Secret.

To access the tender documentation and contact information, please refer to the [attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27708/s4697447---rfp.pdf).

**Contact Information:**
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Canada - (613) 971-7955
forces.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tender-notice/S4697447

The successful contractor will provide temporary help services to DND for the duration of the contract. The proposed contract is a competitive bidding process, with the lowest price selected as the award criterion.  Let me know if you'd like any changes. I reformatted the markdown document.
